name: My Marbles! (Kenney Jam 2021)
description:
My Marbles! was made for the Kenney Jam 2021.

Use A & D or the left & right arrow keys to rotate the platforms. Guide the ball to the star to complete the level. 

Art & Sounds provided by Kenney.nl

Music by Joel Steudler's Cinematic Soundtrack - "Town - Busy Marketplace"

Coding and design by coreylr197. 

**known bugs**

Sometimes when teleporting, the ball will teleport outside of the walls. You can press ESC to pause and reset the level, if this happens.

The hover sounds do not work in webGL build.
